name: Royal Flush (itch)
description:
What a pity, Princess Welda is missing! But our plumber has pipes to fix and leaks to plug so he's not about to let himself get distracted from his job for some sidequest.

Status

A good chunk of the game is done and we had a lot of fun, but English translation is missing and it ends abruptly. We'll try and update it soon! The version you can download was made in 48h for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Credits
This game was crafted by

Victor Nardin
Yannis Naamane
Pierre Frick
Timothée Lestradet
Lucas Bour
Thomas Frick
Elisée Maurer

Music by Robin Dussart
Sound by Kieran Fitzpatrick
